Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: reorganize application into deployable NordIQ/ directory structure

Created clean, self-contained application structure for easy deployment.
All core functionality now in NordIQ/ folder with organized subdirectories.

## New Structure

NordIQ/                          # Self-contained deployable application
├── start_all.bat/sh             # One-command startup
├── stop_all.bat/sh              # Clean shutdown
├── README.md                    # Deployment guide
├── bin/                         # Utility scripts (API keys, setup)
├── src/                         # Application source code
│   ├── daemons/                 # Background services (inference, metrics, retraining)
│   ├── dashboard/               # Web interface + modular components
│   ├── training/                # Model training + CLI
│   ├── core/                    # Shared libraries (config, utils, adapters)
│   └── generators/              # Data generation
├── models/                      # Trained models
├── data/                        # Runtime data
├── logs/                        # Application logs
└── .streamlit/                  # Dashboard configuration

## Changes Made

### Code Organization
- Moved all application code to NordIQ/src/ with logical subdirectories
- Updated 20+ files with path setup for new import structure
- Created __init__.py files for proper Python package structure
- All entry points updated with sys.path configuration

### Scripts & Tools
- Created new start_all.bat/sh with correct paths to NordIQ/src/
- Created new stop_all.bat/sh for clean service shutdown
- Updated bin/generate_api_key.py to use NORDIQ_ROOT variable
- All startup scripts now properly set working directory

### Documentation
- Created comprehensive NordIQ/README.md deployment guide
  - Quick start instructions
  - Directory structure explanation
  - Configuration guide
  - Production deployment examples
  - Troubleshooting section
- Updated main README.md with:
  - New project structure diagram
  - Updated Quick Start for NordIQ/ directory
  - Updated Architecture diagrams with new paths
  - New Training & Configuration section with correct commands

### Files Updated with Path Setup
- src/daemons/tft_inference_daemon.py
- src/daemons/metrics_generator_daemon.py
- src/daemons/adaptive_retraining_daemon.py
- src/dashboard/tft_dashboard_web.py
- src/training/main.py
- src/training/tft_trainer.py
- src/generators/metrics_generator.py
- src/generators/demo_*.py
- bin/generate_api_key.py

## Benefits

✅ Clean Deployment: Copy NordIQ/ folder → Ready to run
✅ Professional Structure: Organized like commercial software
✅ Self-Contained: All dependencies in one place
✅ Easy Configuration: Clear config/ directory structure
✅ Better Separation: Dev docs/business separate from app code
✅ Production-Ready: Suitable for Docker, systemd, or direct deployment

## Testing

- ✅ API key generation tested and working
- ✅ Directory structure verified
- ✅ Import paths configured correctly
- ⏳ Full application testing by user (manual)

## Migration Notes

Old root-level scripts remain for backward compatibility but are deprecated.
Users should now:
1. cd NordIQ
2. ./start_all.sh (or .bat)

All training commands now use: python src/training/main.py [command]

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
